      • objectsFromBucketWillFitInDirectory

        ObjectStorageSpaceVerificationResult objectsFromBucketWillFitInDirectory(Ds3ClientHelpers helpers,
                                                                         java.lang.String bucketName,
                                                                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> objectNames,
                                                                         java.nio.file.Path destinationDirectory)
        Determine if the file system directory specified in the destinationDirectory parameter has enough storage space to contain the objects listed in the parameter objectNames contained in the bucket specified in the parameter buckName. You can use this method prior to starting a read job to ensure that your file system has enough storage space to contain the objects you wish to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        helpers - An instance of the Ds3ClientHelpers interface that has most likely wrapped an instance of Ds3Client.
        bucketName - The Black Pearl bucket containing the objects you wish to retrieve.
        objectNames - The names of the objects you wish to retrieve.
        destinationDirectory - The file system directory in you intend to store retrieved objects.
        Returns:
        ObjectStorageSpaceVerificationResult
